oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Seed Saving Guidelines from John Coykendall
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Coykendall, John
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Seeds; Seed saving; Harvesting; Plant propagation; Vegetables; Appalachian Region, Southern; Heirloom varieties; Seed libraries; Blount County Public Library
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: John Coykendall, Master Gardener at the Blackberry Farm in Walland, Tennessee, hand wrote basic seed saving guidelines and presented them to the Seed Library at the Blount County Public Library, on the occasion of their opening on March the 1st, 2019.
